question: Where is the Indian Institute of Sugarcane Research (llSR) located?
explanation:
The ICAR - Indian Institute of Sugarcane Research (llSR) is located in Lucknow, in the state of Uttar Pradesh.
Ministry of Civil Aviation (MoCA) and Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) have granted a conditional exemption to IISR to use drones. The institute would conduct trials to evaluate drone spraying solution for controlling pest and diseases of sugarcane crop using drones.
